name: Gold Furnace
pages: The Gold furnace is 2x more faster than the vanilla furnace, below is the recipe for it. This furnace can use any of these $(l:upgrades)upgrades/$, and requires the $(l:patchouli:furnaces/steel_furnace)steel/$ or $(l:patchouli:furnaces/iron_furnace)iron furnace/$ to craft. Additionally it requires a $(l:patchouli:items/gold_conductor_block)gold conductor block/$ in one of its recipe.
